page.title: 05SHOPPING IN LAWRENCE WESTON
page.content: There is the odd shop or two at either end of the Lawrence Weston estate, but the variety is to be found at {Ridingleaze.}There is stiff competition here between pairs of {greengrocers, supermarkets, butchers and{newsagents.}You can also satisfy your appetite with a fish or chicken chow mein supper, bedazzle friends with a stunning new{hair}style, refurnish your home or chance all at the{betting shop.}And of course, there are the 'old faithfuls'-the{Post {Office,}the{clothes}and{wool}shop, a cafe and auto spares. The popularity of these shops is reflected by the Saturday traffic jams. The rank of shops recently survived a fiendish plot to build a brand, spanking new supermarket. Thanks to the howls of protest from the locals, this scheme was stopped in its tracks. L.W.School
